page.title: 13Opinions
page.content: We did a survey into the attitudes of the people of Dunston. 2.6% of the total population of Dunston were asked about their attitudes.None said they didn't like the village.61% said they liked the village.38% said that they thought the village was pretty,38% said that the village was peaceful,15% said that the village was quiet and 7% said that the village was good for children to grow up in.It was the opinion of most people that they don't want any more houses built.People seem to like Dunston and the scenery around.The church was burnt down a 100 years ago.There used to be a fish n chip shop, buchers, bakers and a pub.The way they filled out the questionaires they all thought it was pretty.People wanted to live in this village because it is peaceful.
